Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 4/7/1986...
Had first career hit on 5/4/1986, off John Denny (PHI)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Atlanta on 6/24/1987 (Going to LAD: P Zane Smith, P Paul Assenmacher, 2B Julio Franco. Going to ATL: P Ramon Martinez, P Paul Abbott, P Shawn Hillegas, P Chris Hammon
d)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,514,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.66 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1988, going 5-0, 1.91...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,785,714 through salary arbitration...
5/19/1989: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $4,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1990, going 5-0, 1.35...
